article_node.title: Budget Bites: Rodeo Goat's Ozzmosis
article_node.summary:
ðŸ‘‹ Jay here! I wanted to share my experience trying the Ozzmosis burger at Rodeo Goat last week.

Dig in: The masterpiece, if I may say so, is going head-to-head with another specialty burger during the restaurant's Battle of the Burgers showdown.

What to order: The Ozzmosis ($15) is made with a beef  and breakfast sausage patty, fried hash brown cake, bacon, a fried egg, American cheese, hollandaise, chives and raspberry jam.
